name: ExpressibleByBooleanLiteral
desc: A type that can be initialized with the Boolean literals true and false.

items.name: associatedtype BooleanLiteralType
items.desc: A type that represents a Boolean literal, such as Bool.

items.name: init(booleanLiteral: Self.BooleanLiteralType)
items.desc: Creates an instance initialized to the given Boolean value.
